clab:head.clab:title: Supplier Management | D&B For Your Customers

clab:content.p: Help your customers perform effective supply analytics using commercial insight to negotiate savings with suppliers and meet diversity and compliance targets.

clab:body.p: Your customers need to deeply understand their suppliers (who they are buying from). In our experience, vendor data is often incomplete or inaccurate, causing missed savings opportunities. Your customers look to you to provide the complete picture on their suppliers, including identifying and linking all suppliers in a corporate family, de-duplicating suppliers, and offering supplier risk, compliance, and diversity enhancements.
clab:body.h2: How D&B For Your Customers helps you
clab:body.p: Our data solutions for supplier management will help your customers save money and keep their shelves stocked. With easy integration into your systems and processes and unparalleled depth of information, your customers will rely on you for current, accurate, and complete supplier insight.
clab:body.h3: The extraordinary depth, breadth, and quality of our data sets us apart.

ul.li: The D&B Global Database is the largest single source of local and global business data in the world, with information on more than 140 million global businesses in more than 190 countries.

Our world-class DUNSRight® Quality Process—with more than 2,000 separate automated and manual checks, and data updated more than 1.5 million times daily—ensures insight that is accurate, complete, timely, consistent and, most importantly, actionable.

clab:body.h3: Our database building and management capabilities are one-of-a-kind.

ul.li: Our patented Entity Matching technology and unique expertise enable you and your customers to effectively match and link similar data and maintain its quality over time.
Our globally recognized D-U-N-S® Number acts as a key for data, provides continuity and consistency, and eliminates records duplication.
Our powerful Corporate Linkage identifies how corporate families are linked to help your customers understand true total spend (and negotiate better deals as a result).

clab:body.h3: Our uniquely qualified consultative team has your back.

ul.li: Specialized D&B Relationship Managers and Supplier Management Specialists have the expertise, insight, and flexibility to help you successfully integrate D&B supplier management data and solutions into your offerings.
Our one-touch dedicated “For Your Customers” customer hotline is at your service.
